This will deinitialize and reinitialize the bus

briefdescription.para: Convert ESP-IDF error to HardFOC error.

briefdescription.para: Custom fast I2C probe that works around ESP-IDF's broken probe function.

simplesect.para: true if device responds, false otherwise
This function creates a temporary device and performs a real I2C transaction
Much faster and more reliable than ESP-IDF's broken probe function

briefdescription.para: Manages a single I2C bus. Handles bus initialization and device creation.

detaileddescription.para: Provides full configuration and control for the I2C bus, including device management, bus initialization, and ESP-IDF v5.5+ features. Thread-safe device management with proper resource cleanup.
